Title: Lauriana
Writer: Ricardo Lee (screenplay), Ricardo Jimenez (based on a story by)
Actors: Bangs Garcia, Allen Dizon, Victor Basa, Adrian Cabido
Plot: Set in 1955, the residents of a small idyllic village in Quezon are jolted to discover the dark, disturbing secret of a soldier and his common-law wife. Guilt and recrimination abound in ...
